about_the_game:
Yandere x yandere x yandere: one must go.

Yandere x yandere, a vampire-themed Visual Novel.

Summary:

Today is the day when you’re totally, definitely, for sure, going to break up with your... not quite lover. You expect contempt, an argument, or a complete lack of reaction, but what you get is—

A murder attempt* and a proposal?!

*you might or might not be an unreliable narrator

What’s in store:

  • not safe, not sane, but definitely consensual yandere romance

  • customizable yandere protagonist (name, sprite)

  • two (2) yandere love interests

  • unlockable POV extras

  • over 60k words, approximately 5-8 hours of playthrough (depending on your reading speed) for 100% completion

  • 3 routes (X, Levon, mixed) with 2 branches per route

  • 8 branches/endings of varying lengths

  • In-game guide included in achievements, after completing one ending

  • 9 CGs and 13 item images

Characters:

MC:
A bitten vampire, saved by Levon from a group of monster hunters. Sheltered in the mansion of Levon’s soon-to-be (dead) betrothed, MC developed a label-less relationship with his/her/their savior, which grew strained over the years. Currently working as a monster hunter. 

Levon de Nisau:

                                         

Coming from a lowly background, Levon rose to power and fortune by the means of inheritance. Merciless, selfish, and oftentimes harsh, he used to navigate life by adopting a charismatic social butterfly persona. Now, being one of the richest and most affluent men in the country, he no longer bothers with such pretense. 

X:

                                   

Formerly an orphan MC saved from being killed in the witch trials, now a young man who refuses to seek a better future for himself, stubbornly staying in Levon’s mansion as a servant. Despite that, X is rather cocky and brash, even towards his employer.

Credits:

  • Engine: [Ren'Py by Tom Rothamel]

  • Writing: [PDRRook], [Dom]

  • Art Assets, GUI Design: [PDRRook]

  • Coding, GUI Coding: [PDRRook], [Dom]

  • Music and SFX: Nicolas Jeudy of DARK FANTASY STUDIO, Ovani Sound, Joel Steudler

  • Fonts, Free for Personal and Commercial Use: [Prince Valiant], [CAT Altgotisch], [Atkinson Hyperlegible]

  • Kinetic Text Tags Code: [Wattson]

  • Splash Stock Videos: [Vecteezy]

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING for DARK fantasy + romance, including themes of obsession (reciprocated), confinement (consensual), blood drinking and cannibalism (quasi, cross-species), vampirism, constraints (consensual), death, wild animal death(s), suggestive themes (consensual), murder (not consensual), faked amnesia, drug and alcohol use, strong language, unreliable narrator.

legal_notice:
This is the official Steam page for the "Darling, Darling... Dead?" game.

  • Any version of the game downloaded from a different page besides the official Steam and Itch pages is not ours and was redistributed without permission.
    *We are not responsible for any malicious software or viruses that may appear when visiting and/or downloading from sites having non-official distributions.
    *Streaming the FULL game is NOT allowed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

name: Darling, Darling... Dead?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
